casebody.data:
MOORE
v.
MILLS. No. 255A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 14, 2008. Gary K. Sue, Stephanie W. Anderson, Greensboro, for Mills.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 660 S.E.2d 589.

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 14th day of October 2008 to Withdraw Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of October 2008."
